content.question: How will automatic stabilizers affect the economy during a recession?

choices.label: They will shift the aggregate demand curve to the right, increasing real output.
They will shift the aggregate demand curve to the left, decreasing real output.
They will shift the long-run aggregate supply curve to the right, increasing potential output.
They will shift the short-run aggregate supply curve to the left, increasing real output.
They will shift the short-run aggregate supply curve to the right, decreasing real output.

content.answer: They will shift the aggregate demand curve to the right, increasing real output.
